short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: create a qrcode from an url

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A QR code (abbreviated from Quick Response code) is a type of matrix barcode (or two-dimensional code) designed to be read by smartphones. Using QRUrl you can translate any literal URI to a QR code and then use it to share your site in the physical world.
